meanings.definition: A type of ship used in the Mediterranean Sea during the 16th and 17th centuries.
meanings.sent1: The galliots sailed gracefully on the Mediterranean waters.
meanings.sent2: The explorers relied on galliots to navigate the sea.
meanings.sent3: The pirates mistook the galliots for treasure ships!
meanings.sent4: The galliots were like majestic swans gliding through the waves.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the galliots etched itself in his memory.

meanings.definition: A small, flat-bottomed boat used for transporting goods in shallow waters.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen loaded their catch onto the galliots.
meanings.sent2: The villagers used galliots to ferry supplies across the river.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the galliots were magical floating carpets.
meanings.sent4: In the calm river, the galliots resembled floating trays.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sails of the galliots brightened the tranquil waters.
